items.sentence: Tom finally decided to try jumping over the stream.

I\'m convinced that my daughter will pass the exam.
I\'m getting along with my mother-in-law very well.
Tom always seems to be complaining about something.
Tom always seems to be there at the same time I am.

Tom and I are planning on visiting Boston together.
Tom and I go jogging together almost every morning.
